name: Bouncy Football
description:
Tap anywhere on the screen to bounce the football towards goal. Keep the ball inside the field, pay attention to defence players and bounce into the goal line to score.
Turn around, now aim for the other goal and keep scoring as much as possible.

Two player mode is just as fun as single player mode!
Play head-to-head with a friend in split screen mode and double the competition!

Earn throphies and coins as you score, climb online leaderboards and unlock tons of balls!

◉ Easy to learn one-touch gaming
◉ 1-Player and 2-Player Modes
◉ Tons of Balls
◉ Various Football Fields
◉ Prize Wheel & Daily Prizes
◉ Achievements & Leaderboards
